item.description:
Let's go out to Tavern on the Square in Salem MA for a great brunch.

Are you looking for an awesome brunch? Well head on over to Salem and join us. Please note depending on the size of the reservation we may not be all sitting at the same table, if you feel this will be a problem and not work for you, then please take that into consideration when you are RSVPing for this event.

When you RSVP yes for this event: If your plans change come back to the site and change your RSVP or call the Meetup phone as soon as you know. It wouldn't be fair to me or the restaurant if I put in a reservation for people that do not show up.

Brunch menu: http://www.taverninthesquare.com/award-winning-all-you-can-eat-sunday-brunch-buffet

Price: $16.99 pp which includes tea & coffee.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone: 978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues? Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event. Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Come on in and ask for the Donna/Meetup table or look around for us.
item.name: Sunday Brunch at Tavern on The Square
